project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the Second Education Project for Benin is to assist the Government in improving the quality of primary and lower secondary education. The project will comprise: (a) construction, equipment, and staff training for three integrated teacher colleges for primary and lower secondary teacher education with a total enrollment of about 1,190 students; (b) construction, equipment, and staff training for a textbook production and distribution program with an average annual output over the project implementation period of 470,000 books; and (c) staff training, equipment and operating costs for project management and evaluation, and specialist services for identification and preparation of future education projects.
